meanings.definition: The feel, appearance, or consistency of a surface or substance.
meanings.sent1: The rough textures of the tree bark felt bumpy to the touch.
meanings.sent2: The artist used different textures to create a unique painting.
meanings.sent3: The fluffy textures of the clouds made them look like giant cotton balls.
meanings.sent4: The textures of the music were so rich that it felt like a symphony for the ears.
meanings.sent5: The textures of the sandpaper were so abrasive that it could smooth out rough surfaces.

meanings.definition: The characteristic structure of a surface or substance with respect to the size, shape, arrangement, and proportions of its parts.
meanings.sent1: The intricate textures of the mosaic tiles added depth to the design.
meanings.sent2: The textures of the fabric determined how it would drape on the mannequin.
meanings.sent3: The textures of the puzzle pieces made it challenging to put them together.
meanings.sent4: The textures of the cityscape were a blend of old and new architecture.
meanings.sent5: The textures of the landscape painting brought the scene to life with detail.
